remarks: Strong Mathematical Induction for positive integers (inference schema). The first two hypotheses give us the substitution instances we need; the last two are the basis and the induction step.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 21-Nov-2012.)
statement:

indstr2.4 $e |- ( x e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) -> ( A. y e. NN ( y < x -> ps ) -> ph ) ) $.
indstr2 $p |- ( x e. NN -> ph ) $.
